description: This Python source file generates C++ header and source files for JSON-RPC API based on a JSON schema. It includes functions for creating headers, emitting class and enum code, version info, stubs, and RPC implementation code, integrating various external modules for emitting code and handling schema parsing.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file defining the JSON-RPC API header, including necessary includes and comments.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that processes a JSON schema to generate C++ classes, enum registrations, version info, stubs, and RPC code based on various flags and conditions.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
